attributes.action: not fine parents for not sending children to school if shielding or feel unsafe
attributes.additional_details:
As a disabled mum of two who is shielding I’ve made the hard choice to not send my daughter to school due to me shielding but fear I may receive a fine. I feel this is very unfair as I’m trying to protect myself and my family. 

Please either close schools or not fine parents for not sending their children to school if a member of the family is shielding or they feel it’s unsafe to send there children to school.
attributes.background: Please close schools or not fine parents for not sending their children to school if a member of the family is shielding or they feel it’s unsafe to send there children to school.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740

Scrap fines for families with vulnerable members that keep children from school: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549629
